moves.1. e4 e5 2. Nf3 Nc6: Holding off on the queens gambit.
moves.3. Bb5 d6 4. O-O f5: Nows the time for the queens gambit.
moves.5. d3: Not accepted, so I figured out another plan and it worked like a treat!
moves.5... a6 6. Bxc6+ bxc6: Doubling up the pawn but I had to get his bishop out the way so I could get my lsb to b7
moves.7. c4 c5: Moving out the way so the lsb has the line from b7 to g2
moves.8. Nc3 Bb7: Also sacrificing pawn on f5 but I needed his e4 pawn out the way.
moves.9... Nf6 10. Bg5 Be7: Needed the knight, was hoping he wouldn't take it.
moves.11... Ng4 12. Bxe7: Exchanges which I needed as need queen to g5
moves.12... Qxe7 13. Nd2: Was waiting for that to move!
moves.13... Qg5 14. h3: Does not see the mate coming.
moves.14... Ne3: Either sacrifices the queen or checkmate
